title: FDF - Wireframe Landscape Renderer
description: A 3D wireframe renderer built in pure C using MinilibX. Generates beautiful wireframe representations of relief landscapes with full 3D transformations, color management, and interactive controls.

title: Cub3D - Raycasting Engine
description: A raycasting engine built in C that creates a 3D perspective from a 2D map, similar to the classic Wolfenstein 3D. Features texture mapping, sprite rendering, and smooth movement.

title: Minishell
description: A custom shell implementation in C that mimics bash functionality. Handles command parsing, process management, pipes, redirections, and built-in commands.

title: Cabinet Dentaire Rive Droite
highlights: Professional dental practice website with modern design
AI-powered chat integration using Mistral AI
Cloud deployment on Vercel with Docker containerization
Responsive design optimized for all devices
SEO optimized and fast loading performance
description: Modern dental practice website featuring AI-powered chat functionality using Mistral AI. Built with Next.js and TypeScript, deployed on Vercel with Docker containerization. Features responsive design, SEO optimization, and professional UI/UX for patient engagement.
